item.title: Kafre Images
item.description: Faces North Face East Face South Face North Face Width of each stone Coloured by width relative to the average, red = narrower, blue = wider Height of each stone Coloured by height relative to the average, red = shorter, blue = taller Size (area) of each stone Coloured by size relative to the average, red = smaller, blue = bigger Vertical offset of each stone from its course Coloured by vertical offset, red = stone is above course average, blue = stone is below course average (measured between centroid of casing stone, and centroid of the whole course)
